resources.string: Do you really want to quit?

No RPG Maker 2000/2003 games found.

The EasyRPG folder you selected contains a "games" folder. Use a file manager app to put your games in this folder.
Games can be put in subfolders or in ZIP archives.

The EasyRPG folder can be changed in the settings.
No external storage (e.g. SD card) found

Put your RPG Maker 2000/2003 games in subdirectories of the "games" folder.
Games have to be uncompressed or in a ZIP archive.
RAR, LZH and EXE files are NOT supported.

Optional features (Please refer to the settings):
- The RTP (shared assets used by some games) can be provided
- A custom soundfont to alter how MIDI music sounds can be provided
Getting started and adding games (Video Guide)
The \"games\" folder does not exist or is not a folder. Please create it manually or select a different location for the EasyRPG folder. The EasyRPG folder can be changed in the settings.
The \"games\" folder is not readable or writable. Please select a different location for the EasyRPG folder. The EasyRPG folder can be changed in the settings.
Please create an empty EasyRPG folder and select it.
The Download folder cannot be used as the EasyRPG folder.
The selected folder contains other files and cannot be used as the EasyRPG folder. When you remove all files inside the folder you can use it as the EasyRPG folder.
The selected folder cannot be used as the EasyRPG folder. This problem can occur for various reasons, for example if you have selected the root directory or a storage location in the cloud.\n\n
A file was successfully created but cannot be accessed.

This function will open your E-mail program (e.g. Gmail) to send us the bug report.\n\nIf you don\'t want to send a mail or don\'t have a mail program configured you can open a new issue at https://github.com/EasyRPG/Player/issues instead.

Thank you for supporting EasyRPG Player.
 A logfile and your savegames were attached to this E-Mail.
 Please don't remove the logfile! We need a savegame that is close to the bug location.
 Please tell us in detail what went wrong.
Scale to screen size using nearest neighbour (Fast, bad quality)
Scale to a multiple of the game resolution (Fast, smaller image, good quality)
Scale to screen size and apply a bilinear filter (Slow, good quality)
Ignore aspect ratio (Stretch to the width of the screen)
Changing the resolution can cause graphical glitches or break the game. You have been warned!
Vibrate when sliding to another direction
Put soundfonts in SF2-format in the \"soundfonts\" folder. Soundfonts alter how MIDI music sounds.
Please quit and restart the app after selecting a soundfont.
Ignore button size settings and use this instead:

EasyRPG Player requires a dedicated folder. After touching the button you are asked to select a folder.

If you use this app for the first time there is no EasyRPG folder. Create a new EasyRPG folder and then select it.

If you used this app before, select the existing EasyRPG folder.

The RTP provides shared assets used by some games.\nPut the RPG Maker 2000 RTP in \"rtp/2000\" and the RPG Maker 2003 RTP in \"rtp/2003\".\nPlease note that enabling RTP support will significantly increase the initial loading time of a game.
When editing an input layout, buttons can be added (e.g. a Shift button).\n To add a button press the back button and select "Add a button".
